original_text: The Chaldeans burned the king's house and the house of the people, and broke down the walls of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 갈대아인들이 왕궁과 백성의 집을 불사르며 예루살렘 성벽을 헐었고

sentences.original_text: The Chaldeans burned the king's house and the house of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 갈대아인들이 왕의 궁과 백성의 집을 불태웠으며

sentences.original_text: and broke down the walls of Jerusalem
